title: New Lugs Not Drugs Goods
content:
The world feels pretty scary right now. Multiple conflicts, genocide, war-mongers refusing to demand ceasefires. Sometimes, the only way we can feel sane is by riding our bikes. Lugs Not Drugs is inspired by the power of the bicycle. Its ability to make us feel centered again is celebrated by these new stickers. $2 from every sale of this sticker will be donated to the Gaza Sunbirds. Then, there’s the Robert Indiana LOVE sculpture “Lugs” flip, available in pink or blue. $10 from the sale of each of these Pink and Blue LUGS tees will be donated by splitting $5 to the Gaza Sunbirds and $5 to Doctors Without Borders. See it all at Lugs Not Drugs.
